mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY_TBL VALUES(SEQ_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{refBoardNo}, #{replyContent}, #{replyWriter}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REPLY_TBL WHERE REF_BOARD_NO = #{refBoardNo} AND R_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY_TBL SET REPLY_CONTENT = #{replyContent}, R_UPDATE_DATE = DEFAULT WHERE REPLY_NO = ${replyNo}
mapper.delete: UPDATE REPLY_TBL SET R_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo} AND REPLY_WRITER = #{replyWriter}
